articles.title: European Super League: Real Madrid, Barcelona and Juventus under UEFA investigation for involvement in breakaway plans - Sky Sports
articles.description: Real Madrid, Barcelona and Juventus face a two-season Champions League ban unless they withdraw from the European Super League.

articles.author: Simon Collings
articles.title: Mikel Arteta confident over ‘every’ Arsenal FC transfer target despite fading hopes of European football - Evening Standard
articles.description: Mikel Arteta does not believe a lack of European football will dent Arsenal’s attempts to sign new players this summer, declaring: “Everybody is very willing to join our club”.
articles.content:

articles.author: James Vincent
articles.title: Amazon’s $300 million tax bill rejected by EU judges - The Verge
articles.description: EU judges have rejected claims by the European Commission that Amazon owes $300 million in back taxes. The ruling is a significant win for Amazon and another setback for EU politicians trying to reign in US tech giants.
articles.content:
A key ruling in the EUs ongoing battles against big tech
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge

articles.title: Prosus to buy up Naspers stake in major overhaul - TechCentral
articles.description: Prosus on Wednesday announced plans to acquire up to 45.4% of shares in parent Naspers in a deal aimed at moving part of the value of their massive stake in Tencent to Europe from Africa.
